description:
With the Grand Prix Series coming up, Ionodai’s skate-leading club is hard at work at training camp. As friction between http://anidb.net/ch107285 [Maeshima] and http://anidb.net/ch108718 [Kiriyama] builds, http://anidb.net/ch108722 [Kubota] challenges Maeshima for a spot on the starting team.
Source: Funimation
